attributes.action: Convicted criminals should not be given the right to anonymity
attributes.additional_details: Criminals should not be granted anonymity regardless of their conviction. The public have the right to know who they work with or who they live near. The right to know who they befriend and possibly invite into their homes. The right to know if criminals are in their town or city. If their children are likely to come into contact with them. All criminals granted anonymity past, present and future should have their true identities revealed.
